title: Permanently Suspended for "Suspicious activity"??
body:
Hi all.
I was recently permabanned for "Malicious changes" because I made a lot of changes to my account. After many messages to riots support team with heaps of information that was hard to remember about my account (to prove I'm not a hacker and It's me who made the account) the finally unbanned me.
See http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/w0hjnlEz-suspended-for-malicious-changes for a lot more info on that.
I just got an email saying banned untill the year 2100 which is for account security. 

Someone please help.. Very sad because I can't play and I didn't break the rules. I appreciate that they may care about my account security but this is ridiculous.. come on :( My password is so long and ridiculous that no one is going to guess it. It uses special characters, numbers, capital letters, and is long too. I know someone didn't hack into my account. However I did receive an email for a password reset request that I did not make a few days ago for my account. But it wasn't reset because I logged into my account just now and the suspended error message popped up
I know I own the account but riot dont seem to believe me after heaps of information about my account they unbanned me. About  roughly 10 days later, I'm in the same position again?
Update: I can't log into the support page. It says incorrect password (I know it's the correct password and someone couldn't have guessed it and changed it.) I requested a password reset through forgot my password and changed it.  It still says wrong password when I log in.

replies.body: Until we can work this out, if you could please reply to the old ticket, or open ONE new ticket if the old one has been closed and give us the ticket number.

Hello,
this is my sons account. I asked him to log in to his forums and type this. (thank god he agreed to help) He is sitting next to me as I do so.
I can no longer log into my forums account as well as the support page. I don't know the ticket number because I cant access the support page. It keeps saying wrong password even know I know it's 100% correct.

I opened a new ticket. But opened a second one. Sorry. I did so because the first one I didn't include much information. I stated in my second ticket to close the first one. I won't open another. 

Update: I checked my emails. It's in there. number is 20552723 
That is the most recent one with most details. The ticket before can be merged with this one.

Please help.
I'll do my best to get it sorted out for you, I'll see what I can do.

Hey, 
Any reply yet? I have waited since yesturday 2:10 pm when opening the ticket and its 5:31 pm the next day. My son is having to sit with me while I type this on his account as my account (reported4verbal) is not even able to login to forums or support pages.

Hey,

Could you also please ask them to make me able to login to the support site, i know I have the right password and even reset it yesturday but it says wrong password. Ill never know when they reply. 
Sometimes i dont get emails that they replied.

Ok, 

Thanks a lot mate. Please keep trying!
